context.description: With 4WD Jeep Safari, Private tours and Mini Bus Tours we offer the best tours and excursions on the island with over 20 years experience and own fleet of Land Rovers.

contents.class: inline text-sm font-normal text-white italic p

contents.text: “Exclusive Adventure Tours by Trackers Jeep Safari”
“Come with us where dreams are born and time is never planned”
“Discover the Island with Trackers Jeep Safari”
“Exclusive Adventure Tours by Trackers Jeep Safari”
“You'll never get lost with Trackers Jeep Safari”

Over the years we have tried constantly to move with the times adding new excursions and perfecting the old, so as to be able to cater for everyone’s needs, expectations and budgets.  We have something to suit everyone.
We organize team building activities and unique corporate outings for groups and employees of the company, improving employee wellness, performance and Morale.
Guided tours and excursions in Cyprus from Ayia Napa
"Our mission is to indulge you with a lifetime of memories"

Welcome to Trackers Excursions!  Through us you will meet Cyprus the island of legendary beauty, history, and people who await you with warm welcomes. Whether you're craving adventure or relaxation, this idyllic land holds endless treasures for you to unlock.

We offer a wide range of jeep safari adventures, guided excursions, private tours, group incentives and special events within our extensive portfolio of our handcrafted experiences we've prepared and refined over the years for you. We have tours to suit everybody, every style and every budget.  And in the event, we don’t cover your needs, feel free to contact us anytime via our contact form, various multimedia options available or simply give our friendly staff a call. We are always here and happy to help.

On our tours, we see our customers not as a tourist but as a guest to our home. Each one of our tours was designed to make you feel like a traveller, not a tourist. You will experience new things, meet new people, and look beyond what’s right in front of you. Visit abandoned little villages and secluded tiny churches, experience the culture and traditions of each place visited, get close and personal with the local people and locations with breath-taking views.

Whether it’s a simple festival or a memorable event, Trackers Excursions likes to keep things interesting for our all our guests. We are well aware that special events are a great way to build excitement and extraordinary adventures hence our expertise and client-focused approach deliver just that.

Whether you are a family traveling with children who don’t want the inconvenience of coaches or buses or whether you are traveling with more luggage than you can carry or you are simply an individual who would like a stress free start to your visit in Cyprus, let us provide you with a great private transfer service direct to your holiday destination.

Whether it’s a simple festival or a memorable event, Trackers Excursions likes to keep things interesting for our all our guests. We are well aware that special events are a great way to build excitement and extraordinary adventures hence our expertise and client-focused approach deliver just that.
We are based and located on the east coast, in Ayia Napa region. We pick up/drop off direct from hotels or prearranged pick up points.
In a case of private tours and DMC incentive group tours, we can accommodate a pickup and drop off from any location on the island.
It's easy to book our tours online directly on our website, through our various multimedia platforms and or our street offices found throughout Protaras, Ayia Napa and Larnaca.

Besides our easy to use contact form, you can take advantage of an inquiry form that you can find on every single tour and excursion. You can contact our friendly staff over the phone or visit our office in Protaras.

facebookOg.title: Trackers Excursions Cyprus
facebookOg.description: Experience Cyprus like you've never had before.
